How it Works for You
Have you ever felt certain you’d be the perfect individual to fill a position, but never got the chance to interview for it?

TalentFly solves this issue by bringing the interview directly to your prospective employers. Before ever stepping foot in the hiring manager’s office, you can showcase your interpersonal and communication skills by engaging in an industry-specific interview session.

More about TalentFly for candidates
Your brand
Attain a competitive edge & build your personal brand to set yourself apart in a sea of talent
Unscripted digital interview
Bring your portfolio and resume to life with digital interview that enables hiring managers see your skills in action
Show off your skills
Let recruiting staff watch as you answer difficult questions & explain your standout accomplishments
The power of video
Use an effective medium to convince employers why you’re the best fit for their team
Show what sets you apart
How it Works for your Business

For years, hiring managers have had nothing other than applications and resumes to serve as a first impression. While compelling cover letters and succinct bullet points certainly reveal a lot about a candidate, there’s nothing that can substitute the experience of seeing an interviewee in action.

Yet, the process of calling multiple candidates in for interviews is costly and time-consuming, and during that time, your company is losing productivity, stretching its remaining employees thin, and watching the costs of turnover climb higher and higher.

Good news? TalentFly has already done the work for you. With our platform, candidates build profiles and undergo a formal interview.
More about TalentFly for business
Recruiting tool
Watch, replay, & use interview videos as an instrumental tool in your recruiting processes
Assess candidates
Assess candidates’ interpersonal skills without conducting time-consuming interviews in-house
Save your time
Save time by jumping directly to key questions & responses in the interview video
Best fit right
Narrow your talent pool & focus on the best fit right from the start
Boost your hiring process
The problems of recruitment today

That’s how much it costs the average business to replace a salaried employee (SHRM). Oftentimes, high turnover is a direct result of a poor fit from the start.
